review: Seriously great little device.  I own an SAppleTV, that I now don't use.  It can access Netflix, Hulu, and my Plex Media Server all from this device.  To make it perfect, you need to remove the necessity for internet connectivity to function - once this is done, its 5 stars easy!.  Games are a plus and are surprisingly a lot of fun
author: John Hardin

review: Love this.  We are not very up on all these new fangled things and were afraid we wouldn't be able to set it up ourselves.  Boy we wrong it was simple and we had it up and running in less than 15 min and it is so easy to access and use even for us "older" people that aren't up on all these new things to use .  I would highly recommend this.  If you have Amazon Prime its even better as there are way more free movies to watch.  If you don't have Prime get it, if you buy a lot from Amazon or like to watch a lot of movies it will pay for itself many times over in a year.  Amazon is always our first place to go!!!!!!!!!
